Intro to Religious Studies, Winter 2018

This is the webpage for Connie Kassor's RLST 100 course (Winter '18). Here is where you'll find readings, documents, and all information relevant to the course. If you want to find Connie outside of class, she's in Main Hall 411, and her office hours are Mondays 11am-Noon.

Week 2: Scripture

Monday, September 17

  • Gunkel and Westermann, Genesis, Introductions
  • Take a look at the images in this ArtStor collection. Select three images that grab your attention in some way. By the start of class on Friday, write 1-2 paragraphs on each of your three images (3-6 paragraphs, total), addressing the following questions:
    1. Why did you select this image? What specific aspects of this image grabbed your attention?
    2. How might an adherent of the religious tradition with which this piece is associated relate to it? How might a non-adherent relate to it?

Wednesday, September 19

  • Westermann, Genesis, chapters 1-4
  • Lacey, Word on the Street, chapters 1-3

Friday, September 21

  • Crumb, Illustrated Genesis, Chapters 1-4
  • Email your 3-6 paragraphs on the images in the ArtStor collection before the start of class.
